revision.text:
{{doomwiki|Action Doom 2: Urban Brawl}}[[Image:ubdow.png|thumb|Mod played through ZDoom.]]
{{Wad| name = Urban Brawl : Dead of Winter | author = Stephen Browning (aka Scuba Steve) | iwad = Action2 | type = m | status = Released | link = http://www.doomworld.com/vb/wads-mods/66752-urban-brawl-dead-of-winter/ | caco = 21 }}
Action Doom 2: Dead of Winter is a free to download DLC Released back in Winter of 2013 by Scuba Steve for Action Doom 2: Urban Brawl, Featuring a set of New weapons, Objects, Enemies and 2 Ice themed levels .
== External links == * [http://www.doomworld.com/vb/wads-mods/66752-urban-brawl-dead-of-winter/| Action Doom 2: Dead of Winter] on Doomworld . * Download [http://action.mancubus.net/files/ad2dow.zip Here] .
